page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: THERE ARE ONLY 2 CHURCHES IN OUR AREA.THERE ARE THREE CHURCHES THAT BELONG TO TO THE ROYAL AIR FORCE STATION AT ODIHAM,BUT THEY ARE MAINLY FOR THE PERSONNEL AND FAMILIES WHO LIVE IN THE STATION MARRIED QUARTERS. APART FROM THESE MILITARY CHURCHES, THERE ARE TWO OTHER CHURCHES IN OUR BLOCK, BOTH ANGLICAN, ONE EACH IN THE VILLAGES OF LONG SUTTON AND SOUTH WARNBOROUGH. THE LOCAL PRIEST TOLD US THAT VERY FEW PEOPLE CAME TO THESE VILLAGE CHURCHES ON A NORMAL SUNDAY, ONLY ABOUT 5% OF TE LOCAL POPULATION USUALLY, BUT ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS SUCH AS MOTHERING SUNDAY, HARVEST FESTIVAL, EASTER AND CHRISTMAS, THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE IN CHURCH INCREASES SIGNIFICANTLY.
